entities.name: NGO TECHNOLOGY OF PROGRESS
entities.description: The Organization referenced throughout the policy

source_anchor.source_text: NGO TECHNOLOGY OF PROGRESS (hereafter – the "Organization")

entities.name: Organizational Values
entities.description: Core values that form the basis of organizational activities

values: responsibility and the rule of law

source_anchor.source_text: The activities of NGO TECHNOLOGY OF PROGRESS (hereafter – the "Organization") are based on such values as activeness and care, association and cooperation, responsibility and the rule of law.

entities.name: Highest Standards of Integrity and Professionalism
entities.description: Organization's commitment to maintain highest standards regardless of operating environment

attributes.scope: regardless of the environment in which it operates

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization is committed to the highest standards of integrity and professionalism, regardless of the environment in which it operates.

entities.name: Employee Ethical Conduct Requirement
entities.description: Requirement for employees to adhere to highest standards of ethical conduct

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization requires its employees to adhere to the highest standards of ethical conduct at all times.

entities.name: Working Environment Provision Commitment
entities.description: Organization's commitment to provide supportive working environment

attributes.purpose: enable and facilitate implementation of commitments

source_anchor.source_text: To enable and facilitate the implementation of these commitments, the Organization has committed to providing a working environment that encourages high standards of productivity, professional and personal development, achieving organizational goals and prioritizing staff health and safety.

entities.name: High Standards of Productivity
entities.description: Productivity expectations in the working environment

source_anchor.source_text: encourages high standards of productivity

entities.name: Professional and Personal Development
entities.description: Development opportunities provided in working environment

source_anchor.source_text: professional and personal development

entities.name: Staff Health and Safety Priority
entities.description: Organizational priority on staff health and safety

source_anchor.source_text: prioritizing staff health and safety

relationships.description: Organization's activities are based on these values
Organization is committed to these standards
Organization requires employees to adhere to ethical conduct
Organization commits to providing supportive working environment
Working environment encourages productivity standards
Working environment provides development opportunities
Working environment prioritizes staff health and safety

entities.name: Policy Application to Personnel
entities.description: The policy applies to all staff and governance members of Organization

source_anchor.source_text: The policy applies to all staff and governance members of Organization (hereafter – named as Personnel).

entities.name: Personnel Definition
entities.description: Staff and governance members of Organization are collectively named as Personnel

source_anchor.source_text: (hereafter – named as Personnel)

entities.name: Policy Application to Representatives
entities.description: The provisions of this policy may also be applied to partners and other associated entities depending on specific conditions

attributes.dependency: specific clauses and conditions of grant agreement

source_anchor.source_text: The provisions of this policy may also be applied to partners depending on specific clauses and conditions of the grant agreement, suppliers, sub-grantees, beneficiaries, stakeholders, consultants, external executors, engaged experts, volunteers and other associated entities (hereafter – named as Representatives).

entities.name: Representatives Definition
entities.description: Partners, suppliers, sub-grantees, beneficiaries, stakeholders, consultants, external executors, engaged experts, volunteers and other associated entities are collectively named as Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: (hereafter – named as Representatives)

entities.description: Application of policy to partners depends on specific clauses and conditions of the grant agreement

attributes.condition: specific clauses and conditions of grant agreement

source_anchor.source_text: depending on specific clauses and conditions of the grant agreement

entities.name: Policy Purpose Statement
entities.description: The primary purpose of providing staff with clear understanding and safe working environment

attributes.scope: staff of the Personnel and Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: The purpose of this Policy is to provide the staff of the Personnel and Representatives with a clear understanding of the policies, procedures and practices used by the organization and a healthy, safe working environment for staff.

entities.name: Duty of Care
entities.description: Legal obligation to take reasonable care to avoid harm or injury to oneself and/or another person to whom they have responsibility

source_anchor.source_text: Duty of care is a legal obligation of a person to take reasonable care to avoid harm or injury to oneself and/or another person to whom they have responsibility.

entities.name: Breach
entities.description: Breach of a duty of care occurs if a person acts unreasonably or fails to act where action could be reasonably expected and harm is caused to a person

source_anchor.source_text: Breach of a duty of care occurs if a person acts unreasonably or fails to act where action could be reasonably expected and harm is caused to a person.

entities.name: Reasonable care
entities.description: The degree of caution and concern for the safety of himself/herself and others that an ordinarily prudent and rational person would use in the circumstances

source_anchor.source_text: The degree of caution and concern for the safety of himself/herself and others that an ordinarily prudent and rational person would use in the circumstances. Failure to exercise reasonable care is considered negligence.

entities.name: Reasonable person
entities.description: Another person in the same situation would act in the same or a similar way

source_anchor.source_text: another person in the same situation would act in the same or a similar way.

entities.name: Risk
entities.description: A situation exposing an individual to danger, harm or loss

source_anchor.source_text: A situation exposing an individual to danger, harm or loss.

entities.name: Harm
entities.description: Harm of any kind including injury, death, property damage, and economic loss

source_anchor.source_text: means harm of any kind and includes— a) injury or death; and b) damage to property; and c) economic loss

entities.name: Injury or Death
entities.description: Physical harm resulting in injury or death as a type of harm

source_anchor.source_text: injury or death; and

entities.name: Property Damage
entities.description: Damage to property as a type of harm

source_anchor.source_text: damage to property; and

entities.name: Economic Loss
entities.description: Economic loss as a type of harm

source_anchor.source_text: economic loss

entities.name: Injury
entities.description: Personal or bodily injury including psychological, psychiatric injury, disease, and aggravation of existing conditions

source_anchor.source_text: means personal or bodily injury and includes— a) psychological or psychiatric injury; and b) disease; and c) aggravation, acceleration or recurrence of an injury or disease

entities.name: Psychological or Psychiatric Injury
entities.description: Mental health injuries including psychological or psychiatric injury

source_anchor.source_text: psychological or psychiatric injury; and

entities.name: Disease
entities.description: Disease as a type of personal injury

source_anchor.source_text: disease; and

entities.name: Aggravation, Acceleration or Recurrence
entities.description: Aggravation, acceleration or recurrence of an injury or disease

source_anchor.source_text: aggravation, acceleration or recurrence of an injury or disease

relationships.description: Breach is defined in relation to duty of care
Reasonable person definition is read in conjunction with reasonable care
Injury or death is included as a type of harm
Property damage is included as a type of harm
Economic loss is included as a type of harm
Psychological or psychiatric injury is included as a type of injury
Disease is included as a type of injury
Aggravation, acceleration or recurrence is included as a type of injury

entities.name: Persons directly involved in Policy implementation
entities.description: Persons who are directly involved in the implementation of the Policy

source_anchor.source_text: Persons, directly involved in the implementation of the Policy

entities.name: Physical safety of life and health responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring the physical safety of life and health of Personnel, including in high-risk areas

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring the physical safety of life and health of Personnel, including in cases of stay in high- risk areas

entities.name: Information security of Organization responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring information security of the Organization, including intellectual property

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring information security of the Organization, including intellectual property

entities.name: Information security of Personnel responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring information security of Personnel of the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring information security of Personnel of the Organization

entities.name: Material assets preservation responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring the preservation of material assets of the Organization and Personnel within the activities of the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring the preservation of material assets of the Organization and Personnel within the activities of the Organization

entities.name: Financial security of Organization responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring the financial security of the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring the financial security of the Organization

entities.name: Representatives
entities.description: Representatives under the conditions set forth in clause 2.2 of the Policy

source_anchor.source_text: Representatives, under the conditions set forth in clause 2.2. of this Policy

entities.name: Personnel
entities.description: Personnel of the Organization with specific responsibilities

source_anchor.source_text: Personnel

entities.name: Policy compliance responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for ensuring this policy is complied with, along with other related policies

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring this policy is complied with, along with other related policies

entities.name: Reasonable care and duty of care responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for taking reasonable care in work and accepting duty of care for own and others' health and safety

source_anchor.source_text: taking reasonable care in the course of their work and accepting a duty of care for their own health and safety, as well as for the health and safety of others within the workplace

entities.name: Secure environment participation responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility to actively participate in building and maintaining a secure environment through various communication and documentation activities

source_anchor.source_text: actively participate in building and maintaining a secure environment, through open communication, clear boundaries, managing complaints or disclosure, accurate documentation and notifying appropriate authorities of risk or harm in accordance with relevant procedures

entities.name: Harm anticipation and reporting responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for anticipating foreseeable harm and risks and immediately reporting unsafe conditions to direct manager

source_anchor.source_text: anticipating foreseeable harm and risks to self and/or others and immediately reporting any unsafe conditions or behaviors observed in the workplace to direct manager

entities.name: Preventative measures implementation responsibility
entities.description: Responsibility for implementing preventative and risk control measures in consultation with direct manager when harm or risk is identified

source_anchor.source_text: where foreseeable harm or risk is identified, implementing preventative and risk control measures in consultation with direct manager (where practical) and in line with relevant procedures

entities.name: Reasonable person care standard
entities.description: Responsibility for taking the amount of care a reasonable person would expect

source_anchor.source_text: taking the amount of care a reasonable person would expect

entities.name: Direct Manager
entities.description: Manager role responsible for receiving reports and providing consultation on risk control measures

source_anchor.source_text: direct manager

Persons directly involved in Policy implementation are responsible for Organization information security

Personnel are responsible for anticipating harm and reporting

Representatives are responsible for implementing preventative measures
Personnel are responsible for implementing preventative measures
Preventative measures implementation requires consultation with direct manager
Representatives are responsible for taking reasonable person care
Personnel are responsible for taking reasonable person care

entities.name: Organization Responsibilities for Security and Rights Protection
entities.description: The overall set of responsibilities that the organization has for ensuring security and rights protection

source_anchor.source_text: RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE ORGANIZATION FOR SECURITY AND RIGHTS PROTECTION

entities.name: Personnel Safety Priority
entities.description: Organization prioritizes safety of life and health of Personnel

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization prioritizes the safety of life and health of its Personnel, taking all possible measures to ensure them.

entities.name: Safety Training Provision
entities.description: Organization provides training and safety training considering financial capabilities

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization promotes and provides training, safety training, including the procedure for dealing with high-risk situations, first aid, and other activities, taking into account the financial capabilities of the Organization.

entities.name: Board Authority for Mandatory Training
entities.description: Board has right to determine mandatory trainings based on work nature

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization has the right, by a decision of the Board, to determine certain trainings and exercises mandatory depending on the nature of work.

entities.name: Security Plan Reading Responsibility
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must read and understand security plan and guidelines

source_anchor.source_text: Each member of the Personnel or the Representatives is responsible for reading and understanding the security plan and guidelines, including through updates.

entities.name: Labor Protection Instruction
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives receive instruction in labor protection and safety

attributes.purpose: make informed decisions about working in particular field

source_anchor.source_text: The specified persons are instructed in labor protection and safety, and training that allows them to make informed decisions about working in a particular field.

entities.name: Personal and Team Responsibility Understanding
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must understand responsibility for themselves and team

source_anchor.source_text: Each member of the Personnel or the Representatives shall understand the responsibility for themselves and the team, as well as the risks to themselves, the team, and the tasks they perform.

entities.name: Security Incident Reporting Obligation
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must immediately report security incidents

source_anchor.source_text: Each member of the Personnel or the Representatives is obliged to immediately report security incidents to the person performing security functions or the Executive director.

entities.name: Office Security Reporting Method
entities.description: In-person reporting of security threats while in office

source_anchor.source_text: While in the office, the specified persons personally report security threats.

entities.name: Remote Security Reporting Method
entities.description: Phone or email contact for remote work security threats

source_anchor.source_text: For remote work outside the office, should contact by phone or e-mail.

entities.name: Business Trip Safety Measures
entities.description: Organization takes measures for Personnel on business trips to remote/high-risk areas

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization shall take all measures regarding the Personnel or the Representatives in case they are on business trips, business trips to remote areas, high-risk areas by:

entities.name: Situation Assessment
entities.description: Assessment based on official information from authorities and international organizations

source_anchor.source_text: situation assessment (based on official information from public authorities and coordinating international organizations)

entities.name: Route and Travel Time Development
entities.description: Development of travel route and timing

source_anchor.source_text: development of route and travel time

entities.name: Movement Informing
entities.description: Informing about movement during business trips

source_anchor.source_text: informing about movement

entities.name: Necessary Training for Everyone
entities.description: Providing necessary training for all trip participants

source_anchor.source_text: the necessary training of everyone

entities.name: Communication Plan Provision
entities.description: Providing a communication plan for business trips

source_anchor.source_text: providing a communication plan

entities.name: Emergency Informing Plan
entities.description: Plan for informing in case of emergencies

source_anchor.source_text: providing a plan of informing in case of emergencies

entities.name: Regional and Situational Instructions
entities.description: Instructions for conduct in certain regions or conditions

regional_examples: areas of limited or restricted access

source_anchor.source_text: instruction, including the provision of standard instructions for conduct in certain regions (such as checkpoints, areas of limited or restricted access) or under certain conditions (shelling, mines)

entities.name: Project Selection Safety Emphasis
entities.description: Main emphasis on health and safety risk assessment when choosing projects

attributes.focus: risk to health and safety of employees

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization cares about the safety of the Personnel or the Representatives, therefore, when choosing a project, first of all, the main emphasis is on assessing the risk to the health and safety of employees.

entities.name: Gray Zone and War Zone Avoidance
entities.description: Organization tries not to involve personnel in gray or war zones

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization tries not to involve the specified persons in the gray zone or the war zone, concentrating as much as possible, all activities in the office.

entities.name: Office Safety Equipment
entities.description: Safety equipment and plans provided in office

source_anchor.source_text: To ensure safety, the office is equipped with a fire extinguisher, first aid kit, personal protective equipment, action plan (information about the nearest bomb shelter) in case of a missile threat.

entities.name: Project Risk Assessment
entities.description: Risk assessment before starting each project to identify threats and vulnerabilities

source_anchor.source_text: Before starting each project, the Organization assesses risks to identify threats and vulnerabilities, assess their likelihood and impact, and identifies opportunities to mitigate them.

entities.name: Project Introductory Meeting
entities.description: Meeting to inform team members about project progress, risks and mitigation methods

source_anchor.source_text: An introductory meeting is held, at which team members are informed about the progress of the project, risks and methods for mitigating them.

entities.name: Project Working Chats
entities.description: Working chats created for prompt information transfer on projects

attributes.purpose: prompt transfer of information on the project

source_anchor.source_text: And also working chats are created for the prompt transfer of information on the project.

entities.name: Employee Threat Assessment
entities.description: Assessment of potential threats to employees at all project stages

source_anchor.source_text: assessment of potential threats to employees at all stages of the project

entities.name: Risk Analysis and Probability
entities.description: Analysis of risks and probability of their occurrence

source_anchor.source_text: risk analysis and probability of their occurrence

entities.name: Risk Reduction Steps Identification
entities.description: Identification of possible steps to reduce risks

source_anchor.source_text: identification of possible steps to reduce risks

entities.name: Project Evaluation Decision Making
entities.description: Making decision based on previous project evaluation stage

source_anchor.source_text: making a decision based on the previous stage of the project evaluation

entities.name: Ongoing Threat Monitoring
entities.description: Further monitoring of threats during project implementation

source_anchor.source_text: further monitoring of threats during project implementation

entities.name: Organization, Personnel and Representatives
entities.description: Collective entity responsible for non-discrimination and equality duties

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization, all the Personnel and the Representatives

entities.name: Work Environment Free from Discrimination
entities.description: Requirement to take reasonable steps to ensure discrimination-free work environment

attributes.scope: work environment and work materials, actions and activities

source_anchor.source_text: take all reasonable steps to ensure that the work environment and work materials, actions and activities are free from discrimination, harassment, bullying, victimization, intimidation or other unfavorable and inappropriate behavior

entities.name: Inclusive Practices Implementation
entities.description: Requirement to implement inclusive practices in organizational activities

attributes.scope: activities of the Organization, members, employees, engaged experts, volunteers

source_anchor.source_text: implementation of inclusive practices in the activities of the Organization, as well as members, employees, engaged experts, volunteers of the Organization

entities.name: Educational Activities on Non-Discrimination
entities.description: Requirement to conduct educational activities on non-discrimination and equality

source_anchor.source_text: conducting educational activities on non-discrimination and equality, implementation of trainings, programs, awareness raising projects for the Personnel, the Representatives, donors, society, government

entities.name: Complaints Filing and Review Procedure
entities.description: Effective procedure for filing and reviewing complaints based on fairness principles

source_anchor.source_text: ensuring an effective procedure for filing and reviewing complaints based on the principles of fairness

entities.name: Legal Framework Monitoring
entities.description: Constant monitoring of national and international legal framework on non-discrimination

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization constantly monitors the legal framework at the national and international levels on non-discrimination and equality issues

entities.name: Corporate Email for Proposals and Complaints
entities.description: Universal corporate email address for organizational proposals and complaints

source_anchor.source_text: info.technology.progress@gmail.com

relationships.description: Organization, Personnel and Representatives are required to ensure discrimination-free work environment
Organization, Personnel and Representatives are required to implement inclusive practices
Organization, Personnel and Representatives are required to conduct educational activities
Organization, Personnel and Representatives are required to ensure effective complaints procedure
Corporate email address implements part of the complaints procedure

entities.name: Personnel and Representatives SEA Compliance
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must fully comply with SEA principles

attributes.scope: Personnel and Representatives referred to in Article 2

source_anchor.source_text: The Personnel and the Representatives, referred to in Article 2 of this Policy, shall fully comply with the principles set out below:

entities.name: Sexual Activity with Children Prohibition
entities.description: Sexual activity with children (persons under 18) is prohibited regardless of local age laws

attributes.defense_availability: mistaken belief regarding age is not a defence

source_anchor.source_text: sexual activity with children (persons under the age of 18) is prohibited regardless of the age of majority or age of consent locally. Mistaken belief regarding the age of a child is not a defence;

entities.name: Exchange for Sex Prohibition
entities.description: Exchange of money, employment, goods, or services for sex is prohibited

source_anchor.source_text: exchange of money, employment, goods, or services for sex, including sexual favors or other forms of humiliating, degrading or exploitative behavior is prohibited;

entities.name: Improper Rank Sexual Relationship Prohibition
entities.description: Sexual relationships involving improper use of rank or position are prohibited

attributes.scope: Personnel, Representatives and other associated persons
attributes.prohibited_element: improper use of rank or position

source_anchor.source_text: any sexual relationship between the Personnel, the Representatives and other associated persons, that involves improper use of rank or position is prohibited;

entities.name: SEA Reporting Obligation
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must report concerns or suspicions regarding sexual abuse or exploitation

attributes.trigger: concerns or suspicions regarding sexual abuse or exploitation
attributes.scope: fellow worker, whether in the same agency or not

source_anchor.source_text: where the Personnel or the Representative develops concerns or suspicions regarding sexual abuse or exploitation by a fellow worker, whether in the same agency or not, he or she must report such concerns via established reporting mechanisms;

entities.name: SEA Prevention Environment Obligation
entities.description: Personnel and Representatives must create and maintain environment preventing SEA

attributes.general_obligation: create and maintain environment preventing SEA
attributes.manager_responsibilities: particular responsibilities to support and develop systems

source_anchor.source_text: the Personnel and the Representatives are obliged to create and maintain an environment which prevents sexual exploitation and abuse. Managers at all levels have particular responsibilities to support and develop systems which maintain this environment.

entities.name: Child Age Threshold
entities.description: Age threshold defining children for SEA policy

source_anchor.source_text: persons under the age of 18

entities.name: Respectful Work Environment Commitment
entities.description: Organization commitment to creating respectful work environment

source_anchor.source_text: The organization is committed to creating and maintaining a work environment that respects the dignity of all people, enabling them to reach their full potential and empowering them to achieve the best possible results for the people we work for.

entities.name: Commissioner for Countering SEA
entities.description: Role responsible for SEA information, training, and reporting contact

source_anchor.source_text: The Commissioner for countering SEA shall provide the Organization's Personnel and the Representatives with information materials, organize and facilitate training on SEA, and shall be the contact person for reporting SEA cases.

entities.name: SEA Training Provision
entities.description: Training on SEA to be organized and facilitated by Commissioner

source_anchor.source_text: organize and facilitate training on SEA

entities.name: SEA Information Materials Provision
entities.description: Information materials on SEA to be provided by Commissioner

source_anchor.source_text: provide the Organization's Personnel and the Representatives with information materials

entities.name: SEA Reporting Contact Point
entities.description: Commissioner serves as contact person for reporting SEA cases

source_anchor.source_text: shall be the contact person for reporting SEA cases

relationships.description: Compliance includes adherence to child protection prohibition
Compliance includes adherence to exchange prohibition
Compliance includes adherence to rank relationship prohibition
Compliance includes reporting obligations
Compliance includes environment maintenance obligations
Child protection rule references age threshold
Commissioner manages SEA training provision
Commissioner manages information materials provision
Commissioner implements reporting contact function
Reporting obligation can be fulfilled through Commissioner contact

entities.name: Work Mode Determination
entities.description: Personnel work mode including holidays, business trips, holidays determined by Ukraine legislation and Rules of Procedure

source_anchor.source_text: The mode of work of the Personnel, including holidays, business trips, holidays are determined in accordance with current legislation of Ukraine and the approved Rules of Procedure.

entities.name: Working Hours Schedule Authority
entities.description: Organization independently determines working hours schedule based on work areas and project features

source_anchor.source_text: The organization independently determines the schedule of working hours in accordance with the areas of work and features of project implementation.

entities.name: Personnel Lives and Health Priority
entities.description: Organization prioritizes the lives and health of Personnel

source_anchor.source_text: The organization prioritizes the lives and health of the Personnel.

entities.name: Social Package
entities.description: Social package provided to Personnel based on Organization's financial capabilities

attributes.constraint: based on the financial capabilities of the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: including by providing a social package (public transport, insurance, rehabilitation, etc.) based on the financial capabilities of the Organization

entities.name: Work Mode Change Provision
entities.description: Organization provides Personnel ability to contact supervisor for work mode changes

source_anchor.source_text: The organization provides for the Personnel to contact the supervisor to change the mode of work, including temporary, nature of work, place of work (including remote), get a day off, special leave to avoid burnout and promoting the effective implementation of their work by employees.

entities.name: Personnel Reporting Obligation
entities.description: Personnel must report circumstances affecting work implementation to supervisor

attributes.impact: affect the person's employment to implement the Organization's Strategy

source_anchor.source_text: The Personnel are obliged to report any circumstances, including force majeure, that affect the person's employment to implement the Organization's Strategy by notifying the supervisor, except when this is impossible.

entities.name: Professional Development Promotion
entities.description: Organization promotes continuous professional development of Personnel

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization promotes continuous professional development of the Personnel, including intellectual, professional, creative, sports qualities of staff individually and collectively.

entities.name: Capacity Development Measures
entities.description: Organization shall take all possible measures to develop capacity within financial constraints

attributes.constraint: taking into account the financial capacity of the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization shall take all possible measures to develop its capacity, taking into account the financial capacity of the Organization.

entities.name: Supervisor
entities.description: Role responsible for receiving Personnel notifications and work mode change requests

source_anchor.source_text: The organization provides for the Personnel to contact the supervisor to change the mode of work

entities.name: Financial Capability Constraint
entities.description: Organization's financial capabilities limit benefit provision and development measures

source_anchor.source_text: based on the financial capabilities of the Organization

entities.name: Adequate Information Protection Requirement
entities.description: The Organization must maintain adequate protection of information, software and technical resources

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization determines the need to maintain adequate protection of information, software and technical resources while ensuring the integrity, confidentiality, legality, accessibility and monitoring.

entities.name: Information Security Components
entities.description: Components that comprise information security

components: access to and transmission of information

source_anchor.source_text: Information security includes information literacy, separation of powers, access to and transmission of information, privacy, intellectual property rights, preservation of archival copies.

entities.name: Information Security Applicability
entities.description: Information security applies to Personnel and Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: Information security applies to the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.description: Organizational personnel subject to information security requirements

source_anchor.source_text: Information security applies to the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.name: Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: Information security applies to the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.name: Records Keeping Procedure
entities.description: Organization keeps records of information, software and technical resources belonging to the Organization

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization keeps records of information, software and technical resources belonging to the Organization, determines the procedure for creation, access, including the range of entities, the procedure for storing, amending and disposing of information.

entities.name: Information Lifecycle Procedure
entities.description: Procedure for creation, access, storing, amending and disposing of information

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization keeps records of information, software and technical resources belonging to the Organization, determines the procedure for creation, access, including the range of entities, the procedure for storing, amending and disposing of information.

entities.name: Personal Data Handling Requirement
entities.description: Organization must ensure proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data for Personnel and Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: The Organization determines the need for proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data, information security of the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.name: Beneficiary Personal Data Handling Requirement
entities.description: Organization must ensure proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data of beneficiaries with notification

source_anchor.source_text: The organization determines the need for proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data of beneficiaries with notification of such actions.

entities.name: Beneficiaries
entities.description: Recipients of organization services whose personal data requires special handling

source_anchor.source_text: The organization determines the need for proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data of beneficiaries with notification of such actions.

entities.name: Beneficiary Data Processing Notification Requirement
entities.description: Notification required when processing beneficiary personal data

source_anchor.source_text: The organization determines the need for proper storage, processing and transfer of personal data of beneficiaries with notification of such actions.

entities.name: Information Security Cooperation Procedure
entities.description: Procedure for ensuring information security in cooperation with external entities

source_anchor.source_text: The organization determines the procedure for ensuring information security in cooperation with private information providers, donors, public authorities and local governments, international and non- governmental organizations, the media, and other individuals and legal entities.

entities.name: Intellectual Property Rights Requirement
entities.description: Organization promotes observance of intellectual property rights, copyright and other related rights

attributes.scope: with respect to it and in relation to it

source_anchor.source_text: The organization promotes the observance of intellectual property rights, copyright and other related rights with respect to it and in relation to it, with the definition of responsibility in accordance with the current legislation.

entities.name: Emergency Situation
entities.description: Definition of emergency situation covering various types of dangers and risks

impact: saving lives and health of Personnel and Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: An emergency situation means danger of natural, man-made, socio-political or military nature, war, anti-terrorist operation, other measures of increased risk of national, regional, local nature, which may affect the implementation of the goals of the Organization, saving the lives and health of the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.name: Emergency Response Measures
entities.description: Organization must take all measures to preserve assets and protect life and health during emergencies

source_anchor.source_text: In accordance with the assessment of the emergency situation, the Organization shall take all measures to preserve the assets of the Organization and to preserve the life and health of the Personnel and the Representatives.

entities.name: Remote Work Mechanism
entities.description: Mechanism for remote organization of work during potential threats

attributes.trigger: situation that could pose potential threat to life and health of Personnel while in office
attributes.purpose: continue working without losing quality remotely
attributes.location_flexibility: Personnel can be in safe place and perform all tasks

source_anchor.source_text: In the event of a situation that could pose a potential threat to the life and health of the Personnel while in the office, a mechanism for remote organization of work has been developed. Equipment and algorithms allow you to continue working without losing its quality remotely. Each Personnel can be in a safe place for himself and perform all his tasks.

entities.name: Remote Work Equipment and Algorithms
entities.description: Equipment and algorithms that enable remote work without quality loss

attributes.capability: continue working without losing quality remotely

source_anchor.source_text: Equipment and algorithms allow you to continue working without losing its quality remotely.

entities.description: Access to working documents provided through organization's Google drive

source_anchor.source_text: Access to working documents is provided through the organization's Google drive.

entities.name: Remote Communication Tools
entities.description: Communication tools for work coordination during remote work

source_anchor.source_text: Coordination of work takes place using telephone or online means of communication: Zoom, Whats App, etc.

entities.name: Remote Work Monitoring and Meetings
entities.description: Regular meetings and work monitoring during remote work

activities: regular meetings of Personnel and Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: During remote work, regular meetings of the Personnel and the Representatives are held and work is monitored.

attributes.condition: potential threat to life and health of Personnel while in office

entities.name: Duty of Care Breach
entities.description: Definition of when a duty of care is breached by Personnel or Representatives

source_anchor.source_text: A duty of care is breached if the Personnel or the Representative:

entities.name: Reasonable Person Standard Failure
entities.description: Breach condition: failing to do what a reasonable person would do in same circumstances

attributes.standard: reasonable person in same position and circumstances

source_anchor.source_text: Fails to do something a reasonable person in that person's position would do in the same circumstances

entities.name: Harmful Act or Omission
entities.description: Breach condition: acting or failing to act in a way that causes harm to someone owed duty of care

source_anchor.source_text: Acts or fails to act in a way that causes harm to someone to whom the person owed a duty of care, including harm that is physical, an emotional injury or financial loss.

entities.name: Organization Duty of Care Commitment
entities.description: Organization's serious commitment to duty of care obligations

source_anchor.source_text: Organization takes its duty of care extremely seriously.

entities.name: Disciplinary Action for Non-Compliance
entities.description: Disciplinary consequences for Personnel or Representatives not acting in accordance with policy

attributes.trigger: not acting in accordance with this policy or related policies

source_anchor.source_text: The Personnel or the Representatives who do not act in accordance with this policy or any other related policy or procedure will be subject to disciplinary action

entities.name: Employment/Placement Termination
entities.description: Termination of employment or placement for gross misconduct cases

source_anchor.source_text: or in the case of gross misconduct, their employment/placement may be terminated

entities.name: Personnel
entities.description: Staff members subject to duty of care obligations and disciplinary measures

source_anchor.source_text: Personnel or the Representative

entities.name: Representative
entities.description: Representatives subject to duty of care obligations and disciplinary measures

source_anchor.source_text: Personnel or the Representative

relationships.description: This failure condition is part of the duty of care breach definition
This harmful act condition is part of the duty of care breach definition

Duty of care breach definition applies to Representatives
Duty of care breach triggers disciplinary action
Disciplinary action escalates to termination in gross misconduct cases
Disciplinary action applies to Personnel
Disciplinary action applies to Representatives

entities.name: Duty of Care Breach Assessment Requirement
entities.description: Requirement to assess instances of breaches of Duty of Care for their significance using specified criteria

attributes.assessment_scope: instances of breaches of Duty of Care

source_anchor.source_text: Instances of breaches of Duty of Care shall be assessed for their significance using the following criteria:

entities.name: Low Risk Level
entities.description: Impacts the local environment and can be remedied with short term action and there are no ongoing consequences

source_anchor.source_text: **Low - **impacts the local environment and can be remedied with short term action and there are no ongoing consequences.

entities.name: Moderate Risk Level
entities.description: Has a broader impact than the local environment and remedies are readily available but take place over a period of time and/or involve a number of persons

source_anchor.source_text: **Moderate - **has a broader impact than the local environment and remedies are readily available but take place over a period of time and/or involve a number of persons. There may be ongoing consequences, but these are manageable. There may be a requirement to notify regulators.

entities.name: High Risk Level
entities.description: The instance has longer term ramifications of negligence, may require financial or legal restitution, may include data breach instances may result in short term reputational issues and will require regulators to be notified

source_anchor.source_text: **High - **the instance has longer term ramifications of negligence, may require financial or legal restitution, may include data breach instances may result in short term reputational issues and will require regulators to be notified.

entities.name: Extreme Risk Level
entities.description: The instance has major ramifications of negligence, will require financial restitution, will involve protracted legal action, may include significant data breach instances, will require regulators to be notified and there is the potential for long term reputational damage

source_anchor.source_text: **Extreme - **the instance has major ramifications of negligence, will require financial restitution, will involve protracted legal action, may include significant data breach instances, will require regulators to be notified and there is the potential for long term reputational damage.

entities.name: Legislative Requirements Compliance
entities.description: Organization must follow all legislative requirements regarding Incident Reporting

source_anchor.source_text: Organization will follow all legislative requirements regarding Incident Reporting.

entities.name: Incident Reporting Purpose
entities.description: Incident reporting is conducted in workplaces and within work practices to ensure that the safety risks of all parties are minimized

attributes.purpose: ensure that the safety risks of all parties are minimized

source_anchor.source_text: Incident reporting is conducted in workplaces and within work practices to ensure that the safety risks of all parties are minimized.

entities.name: Breach Condition for Incident Reporting Failure
entities.description: Where incident reporting does not happen to minimize safety risks, it may be a Breach of Duty of Care

attributes.trigger_condition: incident reporting failure to minimize safety risks
attributes.consequence: may be a Breach of Duty of Care

source_anchor.source_text: Where this does not happen, it may be a Breach of Duty of Care.

relationships.description: Assessment requirement uses low risk level criteria
Assessment requirement uses moderate risk level criteria
Assessment requirement uses high risk level criteria
Assessment requirement uses extreme risk level criteria
Legislative compliance requirement references incident reporting practices
Failure to conduct proper incident reporting may trigger breach of duty of care
